Title: Designates the tenth day of March of each year as a public holiday, to be known as Harriet Tubman day
Summary: Designates the tenth day of March of each year as a public holiday, to be known as Harriet Tubman day.
LawCode: Amd ยง24, Gen Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law, in relation to the designation of Harriet Tubman day
